diff.patch:
diff --git a/BitPantry.CommandLine.Tests/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorSchemeTests.cs b/BitPantry.CommandLine.Tests/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorSchemeTests.cs
index bfddf15..cd8d525 100644
--- a/BitPantry.CommandLine.Tests/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorSchemeTests.cs
+++ b/BitPantry.CommandLine.Tests/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorSchemeTests.cs
@@ -22,4 +22,27 @@ public class SyntaxColorSchemeTests
         var expectedStyle = new Style(foreground: Color.Cyan);
         style.Should().Be(expectedStyle);
     }
+
+    // Implements: CV-002
+    [TestMethod]
+    public void Command_ReturnsDefaultStyle()
+    {
+        // Act
+        var style = SyntaxColorScheme.Command;
+
+        // Assert - verify the style is default (no foreground/background/decorations)
+        style.Should().Be(Style.Plain);
+    }
+
+    // Implements: CV-003
+    [TestMethod]
+    public void ArgumentName_ReturnsYellowStyle()
+    {
+        // Act
+        var style = SyntaxColorScheme.ArgumentName;
+
+        // Assert - verify yellow foreground
+        var expectedStyle = new Style(foreground: Color.Yellow);
+        style.Should().Be(expectedStyle);
+    }
 }
diff --git a/BitPantry.CommandLine/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorScheme.cs b/BitPantry.CommandLine/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorScheme.cs
index 5deefaf..acc80c5 100644
--- a/BitPantry.CommandLine/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorScheme.cs
+++ b/BitPantry.CommandLine/AutoComplete/SyntaxColorScheme.cs
@@ -12,4 +12,14 @@ public static class SyntaxColorScheme
     /// Style for group names (resolved or uniquely partial). Cyan foreground.
     /// </summary>
     public static Style Group { get; } = new Style(foreground: Color.Cyan);
+
+    /// <summary>
+    /// Style for command names. Default (no styling).
+    /// </summary>
+    public static Style Command { get; } = Style.Plain;
+
+    /// <summary>
+    /// Style for argument names (e.g., --verbose). Yellow foreground.
+    /// </summary>
+    public static Style ArgumentName { get; } = new Style(foreground: Color.Yellow);
 }
